infos.value: What’s the matter? Have you reached your limit?
...Ngh.
I thought you hadn’t the time.
Quickly now. Hah hah hah!
...Look. What fortuitous timing.
Wh-what is that!?
Hah hah hah! Have you lost your nerve?
But what is it...?
Naught but a shadow of its former self.
So it was once human...
Precisely. It is what awaits those who fail to become samurai...
What do you mean?
I surmise you can feel it, too. This mountain teems with madness.
Yes...
That madness loves the wicked thoughts of humans. It wastes no time in possessing them.
There are many who pursue only strength. I will not deny its importance. Alas...
It is not enough to become a samurai of the east?
We grow strong to live in righteousness.
Righteousness...?
Aye. Meaning the east will never abandon those in need.
You must be strong to do what is right. Perhaps that way of thinking separates us from the samurai on the mainland.
They lack righteousness...
So those with wicked thoughts were possessed with madness...?
Correct. Heart, technique, physique... One cannot become a samurai of the east without all three.
So I ask you—do you live in righteousness?
I do!
An unrighteous heart that seeks only strength will be devoured by madness on this mountain.
Knowing that, will you still fight?
I will not be daunted by such threats. Because I have finally found him...
Found who...?
How he holds his blade... There is no mistaking it.
So it’s as I thought.
Your bloodlust... You came here to find that man.
He took everything from me.
I will never forgive him!
Hm...
...Very well. But do not forget, Raviesse...
You must abandon your bloodlust. If you don’t, you will be no different from him—ruled by madness.
...Right.
